name: AVCaptureDevice.WhiteBalanceTemperatureAndTintValues
desc: Structure containing temperature and tint values correlated to a white-balance color.

items.name: init()
items.desc: The default initializer for a structure defining white balance temperature and tint.

items.name: init(temperature: Float, tint: Float)
items.desc: Creates a structure defining white balance temperature and tint.

items.name: var temperature: Float
items.desc: The white balance color correlated temperature in kelvin.

items.name: var tint: Float
items.desc: The white balance tint value in the range of -150.0 through +150.0.
